message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $105?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about $115?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $108?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
